[31/05, 18:02] Adele: Shame, dink Sean het die grootste skrik van sy lewe gekry vanmiddag. 

Ons het bal gespeel in straat voor ons huis, toe skop Sean die bal in groot pad af. Altwee kinders hardloop toe agter die bal aan. Sean wen toe en kry die bal. Anika wip haar stert. Staan wydsbeen in die pad arms gevou.
Bietjie verder af in die pad is 'n kar besig om om te draai om op te ry. Sean skreeu vir Anika "car coming, you have to move" Anika staan. Hande gevou, sy weier om te beweeg. Sean waarsku sy sussie weer 2 keer sy beweeg nie. Ek verder op in pad sien alles.
Die kar het nou klaar omgedraai (maar is nog ver genoeg weg)
 Sean skrik en begin paniekerig raak. Ek worry nie, want kar is nog ver genoeg weg en Anika sal beweeg wanneer kar aan kom maar ek vinnig op pad om te gaan help.
Sean besluit sy Ma is te ver en kar te naby. Hy gryp Anika aan haar baadjie se kappie en begin haar uit die pad uit trek, sy val om maar Sean TREK! En hy hou aan TREK! Anika se broek word afgetrek, Mamma s  dis ok Sean los Anika maar Sean trek net harder. Tot Anika uit die pad is en weg van die kar. Toe ons by huis kom bars hy uit in trane want hy het sy sussie seer gemaak. Die arme kind het hom boeglam geskrik en wou sy sussie red van die kar. Al die adrenalien was net te veel vir hom. Hy was hoogs ontsled. Anika s  boudvelle is af en haar boude pikswart van vuil pad so toe skrik hy eers. My arme liefling kind

You are still on ventilator because you are being a little lazy with your breathing. You also seem to be pumping blood away from your lungs, rather than too them, as you would in the womb. 8:30: 33 Week appointment with Dr Hassim. Placenta showing too many dark spots - delivery scheduled for tomorrow morning 11:30. 13:00 Mamma admitted for monitoring. 15:00 Blood results show low platelet counts (62). Delivery scheduled for 17:30. 17:30 C-section. Mamma under general anaesthetic due to low platelet count. 17:45 Welcome to the world little princess.
Realtively easy c-section with obstetrician Dr Taheera Hassim, Anaesthetist Dr Lisa Todd. Mamma didn't bleed very much despite low platelet count and was completely stable through the procedure. You wailed a little
when you were taken out. You were quickly intabated but had a prolonged bradycardia even after intabation which scared Pappa. You went very pale several minutes after birth but eventually turned nice and pink. APGAR scores 8/10 @ 1 min, 10/10 @ 10 minutes. Paediatrician Dr Christa Swanepoel.
You were taken to NICU quickly after stabilising and stabilised on ventilator.
Mamma is sore but relieved that you are doing well.
